summary: Provides backend components that orchestrate the parsing of PDF documents. The document backend validates input, loads pages, tracks total page count, and releases resources. The page backend handles rendering of page images, extraction of bitmap regions, collection of text cells, layout clustering, and offers utilities for validation and cleanup.
business_intent: To enable software systems to programmatically ingest, render, and extract structured content from PDF files, supporting use cases such as searchable indexing, data extraction, content analysis, and AI-driven document processing pipelines.
